comments.raw_text:
Please add the following tags in the header to the following pages.

For https://donate.mozilla.org/page/contribute/protect-the-web:

<META NAME="WT.si_n" CONTENT="Join Mozilla English Signup">
<META NAME="WT.si_x" CONTENT="1">

For http://join.mozilla.org/thankyou.php:

<META NAME="WT.si_n" CONTENT="Join Mozilla English Signup">
<META NAME="WT.si_x" CONTENT="2">
<META NAME="WT.si_cs" CONTENT="1">

Note this defines the form page as step 1 in the signup process and the landing page as step 2.  We can change the definitions however we want.  For instance, WebTrends allows you to set actions within a page as a step, so perhaps getting to the page is step 1 and entering information in a required field, like first name, is step 2 and then step 3 is getting to the landing page?  We can tweak as needed after seeing the initial report.
